title: Alms4Grandy
description: MERN stack react app designed for the Grandy Community Center. Worked in a team of 3 to create this clean and intuitive website for our final project. Tools used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB Atlas, Express, React, Node, Bootstrap, GitHub

title: Consolation Cat for the Times
description: Enjoy the New York Times with a delightful twist that's sure to bring a smile. Worked in a team of 3 to create this mobile first clean, fun, front-end application. Tools used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, API calls, GitHub
